resources.string: Carefully read the instruction below and click OK to continue."

There will be two tasks in this experiment, you must complete both tasks before proceeding to the next task. 
On each task, a list of letters will appear, the list is presented for five seconds. 
After that, you will need to enter the letters as in the list it was presented to you. 
 
For example: 
If first letter in the list was 'F' 
Then you need to enter the letter 'F' in the answer space provided 
 
There is no way to correct mistakes, so be careful!
